41556.en:
<pc> stayed in a room with a
mirror.
41556.ja: <pc>は　鏡のある客室に　泊まった。

41557.en: <start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>...suke...sai. Please help me <pc>!<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
41557.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「……すけ……さい。
　助けてください　<pc>さん！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
41557.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: ……주……세요.
　도와주세요, <pc> 씨!<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
41557.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……帮……我。
帮帮我，<pc>！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
41557.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……救……我。
救救我，<pc>！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13476.en: <start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>Oh <pc> it's me! Lunan!<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13476.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「……ああ　<pc>さん　私です！
　リュナンです！<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13476.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: ……아아, <pc> 씨! 접니다!
　류난입니다!<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13476.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……啊，<pc>，是我！
我是琉南！<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13476.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……啊，<pc>，是我！
琉南！<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13477.en:
I had decided that the next time I would contact you would be after I had defeated Megidrome...but apparently that is no longer
the case.
13477.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「次に連絡するときは　メギドロームを
　倒した後と　決めていたのですが……
　どうやら　そうもいかなくなりました。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13477.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 다음에는 메기드롬을 쓰러뜨린 후에
　연락을 드리려고 마음먹었는데……
　상황이 바뀌어서 말입니다.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13477.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>我本来决定
打倒麦基多罗姆之后才联系你……
看来等不到那个时候了。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13477.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>我本來決定
等打倒麥基多羅姆後再聯絡你……
看來等不到那時候了。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13478.en:
As a matter of fact, we discovered his hideout in the far eastern reaches of the Rangao Mountains in Ogreed Continent. It's called
Snowfield Ruins!
13478.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「じつは　オーグリード大陸のランガーオ山地の
　東の果てで　奴のアジトを　発見したんですよ。
　雪原の廃墟と呼ばれる場所が　それです！<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13478.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 실은 오그리드 대륙의 랑가오 산지
　동쪽 끝에서 놈의 아지트를 발견했습니다.
　설원의 폐허라 불리는 곳입니다!<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13478.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>其实我在奥古力德大陆的兰加奥山地
最东边发现了它的藏身地。
那地方名叫雪原上的废墟。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13478.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>其實我在奧古利德大陸的蘭加奧山地
最東邊發現了牠的藏身地。
就是那個被稱為雪原廢墟的地方！<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13479.en:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>But Megidrome always has his men with him.
I don't think I can win by myself.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13479.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「……で　そこまでは　よかったんですが
　メギドロームは　つねに　手下を連れており
　私ひとりでは　とても　勝てそうにないんです。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13479.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: ……그런데 찾아낸 건 좋지만
　메기드롬은 늘 부하를 곁에 두고 있기 때문에
　저 혼자서는 도저히 승산이 없습니다.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13479.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……虽然找到了藏身地，
但是麦基多罗姆总是带着手下，
凭我一个人的力量是无法获胜的。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13479.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……雖然找到了藏身地，
但是麥基多羅姆總是帶著手下，
憑我一個人的力量是無法獲勝的。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13480.en:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>I'm sorry to cause you all this trouble, but
could you please come down here and help me?<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13480.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「ご迷惑ばかりかけて　申し訳ないのですが
　どうか　ここまで来て
　私に　協力してもらえないでしょうか？<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13480.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 매번 염치없는 부탁을 드려 죄송합니다만
　이곳으로 와 절 도와주시면 안 될까요?<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13480.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>虽然我总是给你添麻烦，
但是能否请你
到我这里来协助我呢？<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13480.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>雖然我總是給你添麻煩，
但是能否請你
到我這裡來協助我呢？<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13481.en:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>Oh, thank you! I can't tell you how many times
you've helped me and I can't thank you
enough.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13481.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「おお　ありがとうございます！
　あなたには　何度　助けられたことか……
　もはや　感謝の言葉も　ありませんよ。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13481.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 오오, 감사합니다!
　벌써 몇 번이나 도움을 받는 건지……
　이제는 어떻게 감사드려야 할지 모르겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13481.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>噢噢，谢谢你！
我都不知道被你帮助了多少回……
我已经不知道该如何感谢你了。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13481.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>喔喔，謝謝你！
我都不知道被你幫助了多少回……
我已經不知道該如何感謝你了。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13482.en:
Megidrome's hideout is in the eastern part of Rangao Mountains, Ogreed Continent, in the Snowfield Ruins. Please come as quickly as
possible.
13482.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「メギドロームのアジトは　オーグリード大陸
　ランガーオ山地の東部にある　雪原の廃墟です。
　できるだけ　急いで来てください。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13482.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 메기드롬의 아지트는 오그리드 대륙
　랑가오 산지 동부에 있는 설원의 폐허입니다.
　가능한 한 빨리 와 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13482.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>麦基多罗姆的藏身地在奥古力德大陆
兰加奥山地东边的雪原上的废墟。
请尽快到这边来吧。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13482.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>麥基多羅姆的藏身地在奧古利德大陸
蘭加奧山地東部的雪原廢墟。
請盡快到這邊來吧。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13484.en:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>Good for you! ...but it seems you have a lot
of favors to do right now.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13484.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「よかった！……と言いたいところですが
　あなたは　今　たくさんの頼まれごとを
　抱えているみたいですね。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13484.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 감사합니다!……라고 하고 싶지만
　당신은 이미 다른 의뢰를
　많이 받으신 것 같군요.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13484.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>太好了！虽然想这么说，
但你好像接受了很多的委托呢。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13484.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>太好了！
……雖然很想這麼說，
但你好像接受了很多委託呢。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13485.en:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>We'll wait a while before we break into the
Megidrome's hideout, so go ahead and finish
what you've been asked to do.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13485.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「メギドロームのアジトに　突入するのは
　しばらく　待ちますから
　先に　頼まれごとを　片付けてきてください。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13485.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 메기드롬의 아지트에 돌입하는 건
　조금 더 뒤로 미룰 테니
　다른 의뢰부터 처리하고 와 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13485.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>那就等一段时间
再冲进麦基多罗姆的藏身地好了，
请你先去把其他委托处理掉吧。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13485.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>那就等一段時間
再衝進麥基多羅姆的藏身地好了，
請你先去把其他委託處理掉吧。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13486.en:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>...I see. I'm sorry to hear that, but it can't
be helped.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13486.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「……そうですか。
　残念ですが　しかたないですね。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13486.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: ……그러시군요.
　아쉽지만 어쩔 수 없죠.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13486.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……这样啊。
虽然很遗憾，但是也没有办法呢。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13486.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……這樣啊。
雖然很遺憾，但這也沒辦法。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13487.en:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>Still, if... if you think you can help me in
any way, please talk to this mirror again.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13487.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「それでも　もし……もし　少しでも
　私を　助けてくれてもいいと思ったなら
　また　この鏡に　話しかけてみてください。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13487.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 그래도 만약…… 만약 조금이라도
　절 돕고 싶다는 생각이 드시면
　이 거울을 통해 다시 연락 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13487.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>尽管如此，如果……如果
你有一点想要来救我的念头，
就请你再次与这面镜子对话。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13487.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>儘管如此，
要……要是你有一點想來救我的念頭，
請你再次與這面鏡子對話吧。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13483.en:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>Only then will you be able to see me before
you.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13483.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「その時こそ　あなたの前に
　私の姿を　見せることになるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13483.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 이번에야말로 당신께
　제 모습을 보여드리게 되겠군요.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13483.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>到时我一定会出现在你面前的。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13483.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>到時我一定會
出現在你面前的。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

41558.en:
<pc> stayed in a room with a
mirror.
41558.ja: <pc>は　鏡のある客室に　泊まった。

41559.en: <start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>Ah <pc>. You came again.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
41559.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「……ああ　<pc>さん。
　また　来てくれたんですね。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
41559.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: ……아아, <pc> 씨.
　다시 오셨군요.<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
41559.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……哦，<pc>，
你又来啦。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
41559.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>……喔，<pc>，
你又來啦。<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13489.en:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>Perhaps you would be willing to do me the
favor of helping me defeat the Megidrome?<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13489.ja:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>「もしかして　メギドロームを倒すのを
　手伝ってほしいという　私の頼み
　引き受けてくれる気に　なりましたか？<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13489.ko:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>: 혹시 메기드롬을 해치우는 걸
　도와달라는 제 부탁을
　들어줄 마음이 드신 겁니까?<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13489.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>难不成想要接受我的委托，
帮助我一起打倒麦基多罗姆了吗？<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13489.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m02230 _normal m00001>難不成是願意接下我的委託，
幫助我一起
打倒麥基多羅姆了嗎？<stop_lip_animation m02230 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13490.ja: <start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>「クフェフェフェフェ……。<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13490.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵……<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13490.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵……<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29698.en:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>Lunan the mage...to defeat my apprentice, you
are indeed the heir to the secret arts.<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29698.ja:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>「魔法使いリュナン……
　我が弟子を　倒すとは　さすが
　秘術の継承者といったところか。<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29698.ko:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>: 마법사 류난……
　내 제자를 쓰러뜨리다니
　역시 비술의 계승자다워.<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29698.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>魔法师琉南……
竟然能打倒我的弟子，
不愧是秘术继承人啊。<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29698.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>魔法師琉南……
竟然能打倒我的弟子，
不愧是祕術繼承人啊。<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13491.en:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>But I am no match for the great power I have
received. This is nothing more than a shoulder
to lean on.<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13491.ja:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>「だが　大いなるチカラを手に入れた
　我の敵では　なかったな。
　この程度では　肩ならしにも　ならぬ。<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13491.ko:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>: 하지만 위대한 힘을 손에 넣은
　내 적수는 못 되더군.
　이 정도로는 몸풀기도 안 돼.<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13491.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>不过，你还是敌不过得到强大力量的我。
就你这等力量，
连给我热身都不够。<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13491.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>不過，你還是敵不過
得到強大力量的我。
就你這等力量，連給我熱身都不夠。<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13492.en: <start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>You... you are Lunan's companion, aren't you?<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13492.ja: <start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>「貴様……さては　リュナンの仲間だな？<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13492.ko: <start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>: 네놈은…… 류난의 동료인가?<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13492.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>你这家伙……是琉南的伙伴吧？<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13492.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>你這傢伙……是琉南的夥伴吧？<stop_lip_animation m12604 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13493.en:
<start_lip_sync m12604 _normal m00001>Just as well. You will be the touchstone to
